case.title: Wealthy Guy For a Submissive Girlfriend (Anywhere)
case.text: I would love to meet a submissive girl who wants to have a exciting fun relationship with a dominant older guy ... I love traveling and seeing new places ( days ... weekends away ... holidays ) theatre ... gigs ... movies ... fab restaurants ... all sorts really ... I am looking for a genuine girl that likes older guys and would like some fun times in and out of the bedroom.
